info.title: Sales Inquiry - Read (A2X)
info.description:
The service contains header, header partner, header pricing element, item, item partner, and item pricing element entities. You can retrieve all existing data or apply filters.

Note: Certain elements and entities can only be used if you activate the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM. For more information, see Business Documentation.

x-sap-shortText: Read sales inquiries using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads all sales inquiry headers.
get.description: Reads the header data of all sales inquiries.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

get.summary: Reads all value-added services at item level.
get.description: Reads the value-added service data for the all sales inquiry items in the system like vas service, vas subservice, vas texts, vas chargecode and so on. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: SalesInquiryItem
parameters.description: Item number of the reference item

get.summary: Reads a specific element of the value-added service at item level.
get.description: Reads a specific element of the item-level value-added service using sales inquiry number, item number, vas service type and vas subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_SalesInquiry HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
